name: Tea House
description: An elegant establishment serving fine teas and light refreshments; adventurers can enjoy a peaceful moment, meet refined contacts, or participate in traditional tea ceremonies.
atmosphere: The tea house has a refined, peaceful atmosphere with the delicate scent of fine teas and the sound of quiet conversation and the gentle clink of porcelain cups. The air carries the promise of refined relaxation and the essential nature of sophisticated social interaction, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of cultural tradition and the importance of taking time for contemplation and connection.
